name: Alien Puzzle Invasion
description:
A match-3 type game, starring the Alien Queen from the Alien Saga.

French game, English text available. English instructions included.

Make lines with at least 3 objects of the same type.

- Eggs make you lay facehuggers
- Humans can recept facehuggers and create soldiers
- Food is needed to lead your soldiers to a new planet
- Plant can be used in the research department to increase your attack power
- Beware of the missiles ! Humans can hurt you.

You must invade all the 9 planets of the solar system to win.

Thanks to Asraroth for the match-3 engine, and toH.R Giger for the original Alien design !
